    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Numbers 2</string>
            <string language="en">Numbers 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Numeriert 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Numéro 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Numera 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Numera 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριθμοί 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Numera 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you can check if you recognize the different numbers. Contains both sound and text.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let’s Begin!</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can check if you recognize the different numbers. Contains both sound and text. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 1 - Let's Begin!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">Numbers</string>
            <string language="sv">Listening exercise</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">Numbers</string>
            <string language="en">Listening exercise</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie überprüfen, ob Sie die 
unterschiedlichen Zahlen erkennen. Enthält Ton und Text. 
Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 1 - 
lassen Sie uns anfangen!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez contrôler si vous 
identifiez les différents nombres. Contient le bruit et le 
texte. Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - le 
module 1 - commençons !</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode verificar se você reconhecer os 
números diferentes. Contem  o som e o texto. Safir - vida
do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - o módulo 1 - deixe-nos 
começar!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete controllare se riconoscete i numeri 
differenti. Contiene sia il suono che il testo. Safir - 
inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 1 - cominciamo!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να ελέγξετε εάν αναγνωρίζετε τους 
διαφορετικούς αριθμούς. Περιέχει και τον ήχο και το 
κείμενο. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για 
τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 1 - αρχίστε!</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted puede controlar si usted reconoce los
diversos números. Contiene el sonido y el texto. ¡Safir -
inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - el módulo 1 - 
comencemos!</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
